typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sessions as (duration as short, firstVisit as boolean, id as integer, pageViews as short, sessionStart as string, source as string, trackingPageIds as integer[], triggerIds as integer[], visitorId as integer)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourceFilePath',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	wildcardPaths:[("visitor_feed/**/*.json")]) ~> VisitorFeed
VisitorFeed derive(date = split(sourceFilePath, '/')[3]) ~> AddDateColumn
AddDateColumn foldDown(unroll(sessions),
	mapColumn(
		duration = sessions.duration,
		firstVisit = sessions.firstVisit,
		id = sessions.id,
		pageViews = sessions.pageViews,
		sessionStart = sessions.sessionStart,
		source = sessions.source,
		trackingPageIds = sessions.trackingPageIds,
		triggerIds = sessions.triggerIds,
		visitorId = sessions.visitorId,
		date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenVisitorSessions
FlattenVisitorSessions derive(outputFilePath = "visitor_sessions/{date}.json") ~> AddOutputFilePathColumn
AddOutputFilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'outputFilePath',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VisitorSessions

source(output(
		content_group_id as long,
		items as (css_files as integer, documents as integer, emails as integer, links as integer, media_files as integer, meta_tags as integer, national_identity_numbers as integer, pages as integer, phone_numbers as integer, script_files as integer, timestamp as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'file_path',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> JsonSource
JsonSource foldDown(unroll(items),
	mapColumn(
		file_path,
		content_group_id,
		each(items,match(true()))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Flatten1
Unpivot1 derive(file_path = replace(replace(file_path, 'raw', 'transformed'), 'json', 'csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
Flatten1 unpivot(output(
		data_category as string,
		count as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(file_path,
		content_group_id,
		timestamp),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'file_path',
	truncate: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Chrome as integer,
		{Chrome Mobile} as integer,
		Edge as integer,
		Safari as integer,
		{Mobile Safari} as integer,
		IE as integer,
		{IE Mobile} as integer,
		Firefox as integer,
		{Android Browser} as integer,
		{Samsung Browser} as integer,
		Opera as integer,
		{Opera Mini} as integer,
		{Opera Mobile} as integer,
		Unknown as integer,
		timestamp as string,
		analytics_group_id as long,
		analytics_filter_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'raw_file_path') ~> RawAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics
RawAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics unpivot(output(
		browser_name as string,
		visits as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(analytics_group_id,
		analytics_filter_id,
		timestamp,
		raw_file_path),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> UnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics
UnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics filter(visits > 0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(file_path = replace(raw_file_path, 'raw', 'transformed')) ~> FilePathColumn
FilePathColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'file_path',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkUnpivotedAnalyticsBrowsersMetrics

activities.name: Prevent Delete from failing when folder is empty

dependsOn.activity: Prevent Delete from failing when folder is empty
Prevent Delete from failing when folder is empty

activities.name: Prevent Delete from failing when folder is empty
